Table.SCRIPT: Dodgeball is a game that is easy to learn and play. The [{aim}] of the game is [{simple}]. You try to [{eliminate}] other players by hitting them with the ball. The players must [{dodge}] the ball to avoid being hit, which is why it’s called “dodgeball.” The winner is the person or team that hasn’t been hit by the ball when the game ends. You can play dodgeball on any sort of [{field}] or court. When there is a(n) [{even}] number of players, you can play in teams. When there’s a(n) [{odd}] number of players you can play “every person for themselves.”
Table.TITLE: Dodgeball
